mapper.select: SELECT KW_GRP_CO_CD AS KYOWON_GROUP_COMPANY_CD /*교원그룹회사코드*/ , CST_NO AS CUSTOM_NUMBER /*고객번호*/ -- , RVE_AK_MTHD_CD /*수납요청방식코드*/ -- , RVE_AK_PH_CD /*수납요청경로코드*/ , #{rvePrtnrOgTpCd} AS RVE_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD /*수납요청파트너조직유형코드*/ , #{rvePrtnrNo} AS RVE_PRTNR_NO /*수납요청파트너번호*/ , #{dpCprcnfAmt} AS RECEIVE_ASK_AMOUNT /*수납요청금액*/ , #{dpCprcnfAmt} AS RECEIVE_AMOUNT /*수납금액*/ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS RECEIVE_ASK_DATE /*수납요청일자*/ , '00' AS RECEIVE_ASK_STATUS_CODE /*수납요청상태코드 이거 물어보기*/ , KW_GRP_CO_CD AS RECEIVE_COMPANY_CODE /*수납회사코드*/ , '1' AS DEPOSIT_DIVIDE_CODE /*입금구분코드 1 */ , #{dpTpCd} AS DEPOSIT_TYPE_CODE /*입금유형코드*/ FROM TB_RVDW_ITG_DP_BAS T1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.KW_GRP_CO_CD = #{session.companyCode} AND T1.ITG_DP_NO = #{itgDpNo}

SELECT ITG_DP_NO , DPR_NM /*입금자명*/ , CST_NO /*고객번호*/ , CASE WHEN DP_MES_CD = '01' THEN FNIT_CD WHEN DP_MES_CD = '02' THEN CRDCD_FNIT_CD END AS FNIT_CD /*금융기관코드*/ , ACNO_ENCR /*계좌번호암호화*/ , CRCDNO_ENCR /*신용카드암호화*/ , CRDCD_FNIT_CD /*신용카드금융기관코드*/ , CRDCD_COPN_DV_CD /*신용카드법인격구분코드*/ , CRDCD_BRYY_MMDD /*신용카드생년월일*/ , CRDCD_BZRNO /*신용카드사업자등록번호*/ , CRDCD_EXPDT_YM /*신용카드유효기간년월*/ , CRDCD_ISTM_MCN /*신용카드할부개월수*/ , SUBSTR(DP_DTM,0,8) AS DP_DTM /*입금일자*/ , DP_AMT /*입금금액*/ , DP_BLAM FROM TB_RVDW_ITG_DP_BAS T1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.KW_GRP_CO_CD = #{session.companyCode} AND T1.ITG_DP_NO = #{itgDpNo} AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'
